summary: A Male Redguard Preset for S.A.M
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#efefef][size=3]Since I don't have much time to make another Follower, I will drop off a Preset.

Mihail is a Redguard, made to work with S.A.M - Shape Atlas for Men.[/size][/color]


[size=2][i]For the SOS RaceMenu Plugin: There is no direct need to 
change anything on his Dick in the SAM Menu.
I edited it in the RaceMenu.

You can delete that of course or change it if you don't like it![/i][/size]

[/font][i][color=#9fc5e8][size=4][u][b]-Required-[/b][/u][/size][/color][/i]

[color=#efefef][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]RaceMenu by Expired [/size][/font]
[size=3]Eyes of Aber by Aberin
Brows by Hvergelmir 
ApachiiSkyHair (for Male) by Apachii 
Ixum's Tattoos by Ixum[/size][/color]


[i][color=#9fc5e8][size=4][u][b]-Highly Recommended-
[/b][/u][/size][/color][/i]
[font=Trebuchet MS][color=#efefef][size=3]Rudy ENB by Rudy102
XP32 Maximum Skeleton - XPMS by xp32 for the SOS RaceMenu Plugin[/size][/color][/font]
[color=#efefef][size=3]SAM - Shape Atlas for Men + HD Textures from vectorplexus.com
Younger Geonox Face for SAM from vectorplexus.com
[/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3]ApachiiSkyHair natural Retexture by Hein84[/size]


[/color][i][color=#9fc5e8][size=4][u][b]-Installation-[/b][/u][/size][/color][/i]

[color=#d8d8d8][size=3]With Nexus Mod Manager/Mod Organizer 
or manually in your data Folder (SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets) [/size][/color]


[color=#9fc5e8][size=4][i][u][b]Knowing Issues[/b][/u][/i][/size][/color]

[color=#efefef][size=3]-He might get a missing texture, try switching the body weight, can fix it. Because of his Body Tattoos![/size][/color]


[i][color=#9fc5e8][u][b][size=4]Credits[/size][/b][/u]
[/color][/i]
[color=#efefef][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]RaceMenu by Expired [/size][/font]
[size=3]Eyes of Aber by Aberin
Brows by Hvergelmir 
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
Ixum's Tattoos by Ixum 
ApachiiSkyHair natural Retexture by Hein84
Younger Geonox Face for SAM by Don
SAM - Shape Atlas for Men by Vector
Skyrim by Bethesda
